name: personal-homepage-2025
description: monorepo personal homepage 2025 project built as a monorepo with pnpm

scripts.install: cd apps/backend && pnpm install && cd ../admin && pnpm install && cd ../website && pnpm install
scripts.lint: concurrently -c "red,green,blue" "pnpm --filter backend lint" "pnpm --filter admin lint" "pnpm --filter website lint"
scripts.dev: concurrently -c "red,green,blue" "pnpm --filter backend start:dev" "pnpm --filter admin dev" "pnpm --filter website dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -c "red,green,blue" "pnpm --filter backend build" "pnpm --filter admin build" "pnpm --filter website build"
